cards.title: Kama'aina 10% off tours
cards.offerDetails:
The Living Treasure of the Garden Islands, the National Tropical Botanical Gardens offers unique experiences for the whole family. We offer guided tours through Allerton Garden or self led tours through the McBryde Garden. Secluded between rugged cliffs dropping down to a verdant valley floor, prepare to be inspired, amazed and relaxed by nature, history, and culture.

Call 808-742-2623 or visit NTBG.org. Present your local ID at check-in to save 10% off!

cards.title: Rates starting at $139/night
cards.offerDetails:
Your home away from home. Aston at Poipu Kai is perfect for your Staycation. Accommodations range from one to three bedroom suites, as well as two, three and four bedroom private homes. Kama‘āina receive free parking. Fully equipped kitchen, washer and dryer, beach towels are provided for you! No need bring 'em. Book direct and save.

Call 855-747-0759 and book today. *

Must present valid State of Hawaii ID upon check-in. Other restrictions may apply.
